participant_1.background:
I like to read fairytales on the weekends because they are a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
i work for a clothes retailer.
i have a family of three daughters.
My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
I am a software engineer who works remotely, so I can live in a big city and still take care of my parents in my hometown.

participant_2.background:
When I want a sweet treat, I enjoy a pear.
i don t like wearing a swimsuit.
I usually spend my free time practicing music or reading about clothing trends.
I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
my weekends are spent studying and looking over client files.

content.text: I like to read fairytales on the weekends. Do you have a favorite book?
I love to read about clothing trends. I have to admit I don't read much fiction.
When I want a sweet treat, I enjoy a pear. What's your favorite kind of fruit?
Pears are great! I love peaches.
I love peaches too. I'm a software engineer who works remotely, so I can live in a big city and still take care of my parents in my hometown. What do you do for work?
I'm a student trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby. I'm also interested in music and clothing.
Wow, that's great. I'm really proud of you for quitting smoking. I have three daughters, so I know how important it is to be healthy for your family.
Thanks! I appreciate that. I'm really trying my best.
I'm sure you'll do great. What are you studying?
That's a great field. I'm sure you'll be successful
